name: Resident of Plane
description:
Game Overview

This experimental puzzle game is inspired by an old Chinese saying, "当局者迷, 旁观者清", which means that "player confused, spectator clear". 

The experience of the game is a bit like solving a Rubik's cube blindfolded. The player have to observe the whole puzzle in 3D view before the game start. Then, the main character will become a 2D guy who can only see one surface, which may confuse you. You should reach 5 target points with your memory and spatial perception, and try to clear the level faster and with the shortest path.

BTW, you will have 3 extra times to observe the 3D level by pressing Space.

Instructions

WASD  Move

Space    Switch to 2D/3D view

LMB       Rotate in 3D view

MMB     Zoom in 3D view

RMB      Reset camera in 3D view

R              Restart the current level

ESC        Return to menu / Exit the game

Credits
